title: Indian Summers: Episode 6 Preview Masterpiece
text: The summer heats up when forbidden love strikes both sides of Simla. Indian Summers, Episode 6 airs Sunday, November 1, 2015 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
